actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1975, 1976 and 1977.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations under the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of $50,000,000 for fiscal year 1975; $53,000,000 for fiscal year 1976; and $55,000,000 for fiscal year 1977. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1409)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1975, 1976 and 1977.
